name: Pa Pa Land: Head Escape
description:
Fly fast and escape from the projectiles to survive and free the land. Upgrade your character and choose a companion that matches your play style and pop the balloon heads as much as you can and get a higher score.

Each item in Pa Pa Land has its opposite effect which you can use them intelligently and take the advantage. Use the invaders power against themselves and destroy them.

FEATURES

• Hand-drawn doodle visuals and detailed animations
• Cool characters with different characteristics
• Unlock new cosmetic items to customize characters look
• Follower characters to help you resist more
• Amazing sounds and music
• Large range of game events and enemy types
• Tricky attack mechanics

STORY

Everything started with a black & white sketch. Papers were crumbling and being torn by scissors to finally create the Pa Pa Land's world.

Heads were living in peace when suddenly invaders come who wanted to push them out of their home. Heads were uniting to overcome the invaders and don't let them take over the Pa Pa Land.

Now that Pa Pa Land is still the land of the heads, help them to survive and defend their world.
